nodes.text: Choose Your Destiny: A Finn & Poe Adventure

Choose Your Destiny: A Finn & Poe Adventure is a canon adventure book written by Cavan Scott and illustrated by Elsa Charretier. It is the fourth novel in the Star Wars: Choose Your Destiny anthology series, and it is part of the Journey to Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker publishing program. The book was published on October 4, 2019 by Disney–Lucasfilm Press.
Join Finn, Poe, and BB-8 as they infiltrate a First Order–occupied bacta plant for General Leia Organa.
With over twenty possible outcomes, you'll have to choose carefully to keep Finn, Poe, and BB-8 safe from the First Order.
